scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report || allure open  allure-report
scripts.test:allure: npm run cy:clientLogin || npm run report:allure
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/latest/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report/latest || true
scripts.cy:run: yarn cypress run --config video=false --env allure=true --browser chrome
